snippet: Wide receiver Brandon Marshall and quarterback Jay Cutler, who both made the Pro Bowl in 2008 when they were with the Broncos, hope to have similar success in Chicago.
abstract: Chicago Bears get an offensive lift with wide receiver Brandon Marshall being reunited with quarterback Jay Cutler.
lead_paragraph: Wide receiver Brandon Marshall and quarterback Jay Cutler, who both made the Pro Bowl in 2008 when they were with the Broncos, hope to have similar success in Chicago.

headline.seo: Cutler-Marshall Reunion Puts Spotlight on Bears’ Offense
headline.main: Cutler-Marshall Reunion Gives Bears’ Offense a Lift
headline.print_headline: Cutler-Marshall Reunion Gives Bears’ Offense a Lift
